name: Patti Schuman
coverLetter:
Patricia Schuman
Silverton, Oregon
(971) 304-5037
patti@dr.com  

Experienced professional cannabis trimmer/worker, seeking new opportunities.
- Trim 1-to-2 pounds per day. 
- Possess an active OLCC Marijuana Workers Permit. 
- Have reliable transportation; willing to commute 
    (...reasonable distance / dependent on opportunity)
- Very enthusiastic and personable; flexible and 
    always on task; reliable and dedicated worker and an 
    excellent trimmer.
- Currently employed (2 yrs.) at Holy Child Farms, Polk County (see below)
 
  I am available to begin work full time now, with 
reasonable notice. Please contact me at the phone 
number listed above (call/text), or email reply.  

Thank you for your consideration.
    Patti Schuman
